Flush Frame and Sash Design The coplanar design ensures the frame and sash align seamlessly when closed, providing a clean appearance and easier maintenance. title: Bucalu
specs: = ™ Founded in 2009, Bucalu is an expert in high-performance aluminium windows and doors solutions that integrate in-house R&D, sales, technical services, and supply chain management. Bucalu has a holistic R&D and engineering system that is applied with a system-thinking approach throughout all stages: R&D design, technical evaluation, processing & manufacturing, and product installation. It is committed to providing high-performance products to the market, complying with ASTM, NFRC, CSA, and AS/NZS standards. Over the past few decades, Bucalu products have been applied to over 10 million square meters of buildings globally, including well-known landmark structures, luxury villas, and high-end residential projects. In the future, Bucalu will continue the transformation of the facades, innovation, and sustainability. 05 Beyond a Greener Future We firmly believe that aesthetics and sustainability can complement each other. At Bucalu, we strive to inspire exquisite design while alleviating the planet's burden with low-carbon solutions. Our mission is to reduce environmental impact and enhance living comfort through innovative window solutions, which drives Bucalu's actions across key areas, including recycling aluminum extrusion, resilient supply chains, digital transformation, a culture of excellence among employees, and social responsibility. Over 10 years of data collection, Bucalu's products have achieved energy savings of 20%-36%, equivalent to planting four trees per household annually. We have obtained the PHB rating from the German Passive House certification. We are continuously working with our partners to provide cutting-edge solutions that harmonize aesthetic value with energy efficiency, driving the entire construction industry toward a greener and more sustainable future.
